author: Reuters Editorial
title: RPT-China QFII quota rises to $99.46 bln at end-April - FX regulator
text:
(Repeats to attach to alerts. No change to text.)
BEIJING, April 25 (Reuters) - The outstanding amount of Chinaâ€™s dollar-denominated Qualified Foreign Institutional Investor (QFII) programme rose to $99.46 billion as of April 24, from $99.36 billion at the end of March, the foreign exchange regulator said on Wednesday.
The QFII scheme was created by China to allow foreigners to invest in Chinese capital markets. (Reporting By Beijing Monitoring Desk)
